DOC.brief_summary: A standardized tetanic stimulation is applied to patients under propofol-remifentanil TCI, in a cross-over fashion, at two different levels of anesthesia monitored by the BIS: BIS 25 and BIS 55. Remifentanil target remains constant during the whole study period (1 ng/ml). Pupillary reflex dilation is recorded after each stimulation.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Depth of Anesthesia on Pupillary Reactivity to a Standardized Stimulus
DOC.criteria: ASA 12 scheduled for an idiopathic scoliosis surgical correction Ophtalmologic pathology Neurologic or muscular pathology Metabolic pathology Chronic pain
